data.name: final m00n - Defender of the Cubes The Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Release delay

Thanks to all, who have expected final m00n - Defender of the Cubes and the soundtrack (OST) to the game for so long and so much.

For technical reasons, final m00n - DotC "The Soundtrack" will be available for download from Monday (02.18.2019).
Excuse me and thank you for your support.


About the Game

This soundtrack was produced specifically for the individual m00ns, and their respective uniqueness and the special atmosphere on it.


It was important to us to combine three things in the songs for this game:
  • It should be a tribute to the music of the old days of arcade shooters.
  • The compositions should not sound the way music sounds today. Rather, how like music could sounds in over a million years in the future.
  • The mood of the time of the UFO-Classics (and sightings of flying saucers) of the 60s, 70s & 80s should be included.
After a time-consuming search in the recording studio for the right instruments, we decided to use Output's virtual instruments. These sounds made us feel like composing music for a game, so apocalyptic and as far as no game ever in the future.
The individual tracks were composed in the Artist Tonstudio. The complete experience you get in this DLC ...

Track List:

1. Main Theme (3:30″)

2. The Sky 4 (5:27″)
3. The Tale (2:05'')
4. The Beginnin’ (6:23″)
5. 3 Cubes (2:58″)
6. The Old Main New (4:34″)
7. Don’t Try To Be A Hero (1:21″)
8. Full Arcade (9:23″)
9. Little Satellite (5:55″)
10. Max Output (1:45″)
11. Only Meteors (5:46″)
12. In The Year… (1:26″)
13. Die Akte (5:04″)
14. The Old Main (6:47″)
15. Don’t Try To Be A Hero Extended (2:28″)

Bonus Tracks:
16. Main Theme Remixed (4:39″)
17. Now It Starts (5:48″)

fullgame.name: final m00n - Defender of the Cubes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia card with 1GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.14.x
  • Processor: 3,2 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 775M 2 GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
